paper_abstract: An error analysis is given for convolution quadratures based on strongly A-stable Runge-Kutta methods, for the non-sectorial case of a convolution kernel with a Laplace transform that is polynomially bounded in a half-plane. The order of approximation depends on the classical order and stage order of the Runge-Kutta method and on the growth exponent of the Laplace transform. Numerical experiments with convolution quadratures based on the Radau IIA methods are given on an example of a time-domain boundary integral operator.
paper_title: An error analysis of Runge-Kutta convolution quadrature
